item.description:
Here's a great show for a Tuesday night. Two wonderful acts for the price of one!! La Tuza plays traditional Mexican roots music -- really lovely. And Sofia Koutsovitis's music is grounded in traditional South American genres -- but laced with jazz and more contemporary stylings. This should be a very savory evening.

Also of note: my musicians microfinancing project has just launched with a new live album project for Alex Alvear and his group Mango Blue. He is traveling to Mumbai, India to perform and record a live album. He is raisning funds to release the new project -- you can preorder a copy and you'll get two tickets to his album release party. please go to http://tuneyourworld.... to learn more...

you really can change the way the world finances music... ;-)

hope to see you next week,

brad
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be standing at the bar before the show starts
item.name: LA TUZA & SOFIA KOUTSOVITIS at Johnny D's
